last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 30
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sherine confesses that she was Farah's accomplice in killing Hesham and she's imprisoned. Marwan is executed. Men'em miraculously survives the stabbing.

name: Broken Promises
overview: Ahd is a wealthy woman who's the head of the family, and she has always depended on coffee readings to predict significant and life-altering events in her personal and family lives, but she gradually learns that her own family is plotting against her.
